page.title: 11CARNIVAL WEEK
page.content: Each year in Combe Martin on the 3rd of August Carnival week starts. It is a week that everyone enjoys well most people. Some people dress up and go in a wheelbarrow race from the top pub which is the London Inn down to the bottom pub which is the Dolphin inn.They have to stop at every pub and drink a pint of beer some people just tip it down them. And some people on the next night do a raft race,one for children and one for adults and after the raft race there is a disco. At Hollands Park there is a Donkey Derby for children and the best night of all is the carnival procession people dress up some as clowns some go on floats. It is a really exciting week.
